Debut CD release for rock singer/songwriter's 1971 album. Recorded with Elton John on piano, guitar legend Chris Spedding and Pentangle's drummer Terry Cox, all on leave from recording John's 'Madman Across The Water' album. Duncan first rose to prominence when John recorded her composition 'Love Song' for his 'Tumbleweed Connection' album in 1970. 2000 release standard jewelcase
